description:
Photoshop is a great tool for editing images, creating graphics, manipulating photos, and an infinite number of other uses. If you've ever wanted to jump right into using Photoshop, and just want an easy way to understand how to use all of the tools, take this course.

Everything you need to know to get started in Photoshop. This course goes over all the tools including but not limited to:

  • Marquee Tool
  • Lasso Tool
  • Magic Wand
  • Spot Healing Brush
  • Paint Brushes
  • Clone Stamping
  • Gradient Tool
  • Dodge, Burn, Sponge Tools
  • Type Tool
  • Shape Tools
  • More!

Each short 2-6 minute lesson goes over a different tool so that you can watch them whenever you have a spare moment. You can learn the entire course in one day!

Take this course if you want to become a serious Photoshop pro! If you're a beginner, this is a great course for you. If you've been working with Photoshop for a while, you might learn a new thing or too!
title: Photoshop Tools Crash Course: Start Using Photoshop Today
